mean_cn: v.改写，重写（读作/riˈraɪt/）；  n.重写或改写的文稿，改写的作品（读作/ˈriˌraɪt/）
mean_en: to write (something) again especially in a different way in order to improve it or to include new information
sentence: I have rewritten this form for several times.
sentence_trans: 这表格我已经重写过很多次了。
word_etyma: re重新 + write写 → rewrite改写；重写
